visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a lollipop chart displaying the top 10 countries by population for the year 2024. The chart should have a title 'Top 10 Countries by Population', a subtitle '2024', and the x-axis should be categorical with country names. The y-axis should be titled 'Population'. The chart should not display a legend and should have shared tooltips. The axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a lollipop chart, which is a variant of column charts with a circle marker for the data value and a line extending to the axis. The chart displays the top 10 countries by population for the year 2024. The title of the chart is 'Top 10 Countries by Population' with a subtitle '2024'. The x-axis is categorical, representing the country names, and the y-axis represents the population with a title 'Population'. The axes and labels are styled with a dark gray color (#333333) and specific font sizes for readability. The chart does not display a legend and has shared tooltips for better accessibility and user interaction.
